text:
When President Trump signs the historic $2 trillion coronavirus bill -- the largest single stimulus package passed by Congress -- he will be surrounded by Republicans. Not one Democratic has been invited, per WH list.

It appears Pres Trump & Speaker Pelosi still aren't speaking. https://t.co/ISwZaAyNQs

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
